price: Òun ni Ẹni tí Ó ṣẹ̀dá yín láti ara ẹ̀mí ẹyọ kan. Nítorí náà, ibùgbé (nílé ayé) àti ibùpadàsí (ní ọ̀run wà fún yín). A kúkú ti ṣàlàyé àwọn āyah fún àwọn ènìyàn tó ní àgbọ́yé.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنشَأَكُم مِّن نَّفۡسٖ وَٰحِدَةٖ فَمُسۡتَقَرّٞ وَمُسۡتَوۡدَعٞۗ قَدۡ فَصَّلۡنَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَفۡقَهُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī ansha-akum min nafsin wāḥidatin famus'taqarrun wamus'tawdaʿun qad faṣṣalnā al-āyāti liqawmin yafqahūna
translations: so (there is) a place of dwelling
